content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify the main argument made in the passage about Timur’s empire. b) Identify ONE major economic development in Eurasia in the period circa 1200–1450 that is illustrated by the passage. c) Describe ONE example of how economic interactions such as those described in the passage affected the cultural development of Eurasia in the period 1200–1450.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
